I Am Jay The

I specialize in graphic design and web development

View My Work

I Specialize In

UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications, web development, and creating digital masterpieces

Fast

Speed matters. I want the fastest and lag-free experience for my users.

User-friendly UI/UX

A good website does not make you search for what you need. Layouts need to be easily interactable and simple.

Compatible

A website that can function across different browsers and display-modes is always a plus.

Dynamic

I like to make websites dynamic and exciting.
It does not have to be static.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Brainstorming & Concepting

Choose a theme and conduct research regarding the style and branding of this project.

2

Coding

Focus on delivering the brainstormed ideas to the project and develop.

3

Testing & Debugging

Test for any bugs or errors and update the project with the fixed version. Finalize with the overall visual and performance to publish.

4

Receiving Feedback

Constantly look for improvement by getting feedback and making updates.
